modName: Dovahkiin by Brandon Strader - Main Menu Theme Replacer
summary: Puts the awsomeness back in your main menu with a top-notch musical wonder.
descriptionHtml:
This is a replacer file for the main menu music, swapping out the vanilla Skyrim theme for this wonderful metal treat by Brandon Strader. I claim no credit, all i did was figure out how to convert the audio.

Youtube URL, for those to want to listen before they download: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vQt3p8_ixVM

The mp3 is available somewhere at ocremix.org

CREDITS
Brandon Strader for the original music
Overclocked Remix for giving it a place
Bethesda and Nexus for the obvious reasons =)
author: arecaidianfox
